casebody.data:
Donald S. AZAR, Appellant, v. Ivan ALLEN et al., Appellees. No. 21142. United States Court of Appeals Fifth Circuit. Oct. 15, 1964. Wesley R. Asinof, Atlanta, Ga., for appellant. Henry L. Bowden, City,Atty., Ferrin Y. Mathews, Atlanta, Ga., for appellees.

Before BROWN and BELL, Circuit Judges and SPEARS, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

This matter having been decided by the District Court prior to our decision in Hornsby v. Allen, 5 Cir., 1964, 326 F.2d 605, rehearing denied, 330 F.2d 55; and it appearing that it is controlled by that decision; the same is hereby reversed and remanded to the District Court for further consideration in the light thereof.
